properties.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued January 6 at 9:52AM EST until January 7 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of
5 to 10 inches in the most persistent lake snows. Winds gusting
as high as 35 mph creating drifting and blowing snow.

* WHERE...The Eastern Lake Ontario Region. Greatest snow amounts
will be on the Tug Hill.

* WHEN...Until 4 AM EST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous
conditions could impact the evening commute.
properties.instruction:
Heavy snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be
prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities.

Submit snow reports through our website or social media.

NWSheadline: LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM EST TUESDAY
